UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Stapled Peptides Based on Human Angiotensin-Converting Enzyme 2 (ACE2) Potently Inhibit SARS-CoV-2 Infection In Vitro.
Literature.Author: Curreli F, Victor SMB, Ahmed S, Drelich A, Tong X, Tseng CK, Hillyer CD, Debnath AK

Sequence Information.Target Organism: SARS-CoV-2 PsV(IC50 I=4.1±0.26µM),SARS-CoV-2 PsV(IC50 I=2.2±0.14µM),Vesicular Stomatitis Virus (VSV) PsV(IC50 I=>27.5µM),Human lung carcinoma A549(50-60% Cytotoxicity=>27.5µM),Human fibrosarcoma HT1080(50-60% Cytotoxicity=>27.5µM),SARS-CoV-2(90-100% Inhibition=17.2µM)
